Breadth-First.Explanation: Initial clue collection and hypothesis generation, listing visual features and suggesting a possible borough.

Depth-First.Explanation: Verifies distinctive yellow signage to confirm airport identity.
Analyzes terminal structure details to match with known airport interior.
Depth-First.KeyElement: steel truss roof and wooden benches

Depth-First.Explanation: Uses location information of confirmed airport to pinpoint borough.
Summarizes and confirms the final location based on prior verifications.

Breadth-Depth Switch.Explanation: After initial hypothesis, the analysis shifts to verifying specific visual clues.
